headline.main: Votto, Trout Among Talented Sluggers on Struggling Teams
headline.print_headline: Votto, Trout Among Talented Sluggers on Struggling Teams

lead_paragraph: Joey Votto fielded grounders over and over again until most of the Cincinnati Reds were long gone, off to a spring game, weights, or just the rest of the day. He threw home. He threw to second. He practiced underhand tosses to first, backhands, everything.
